meanings.sent1: The children were jubilantly playing in the park.
meanings.sent2: She smiled jubilantly when she received the good news.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail jubilantly after finding its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed jubilantly under the warm sun.
meanings.sent5: The audience clapped jubilantly at the end of the performance.

meanings.definition: In a manner expressing triumph or celebration.
meanings.sent1: The team cheered jubilantly after winning the championship.
meanings.sent2: She waved jubilantly to her friends from the parade float.
meanings.sent3: The cake disappeared jubilantly from the plate at the party.
meanings.sent4: The fireworks lit up the sky jubilantly on New Year's Eve.
meanings.sent5: The students danced jubilantly at the school assembly.
